posts.post_title: FS: T205s Raw/Graded Cobb++ PRICES REDUCED
posts.post_content:
Please add $3 for First Class shipping for totals under $100.  Paypal add 3%, insurance at your option. 

Scans of all cards are available [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/mwieder/ForTradeSale"]here[/URL]. Click on the magnifying glass icon when viewing a picture to see high resolution front/back scans.
